text: Simple question here - how can I set the Y axis of a plot to a log scale in Makie? I really like the system but the documentation is a bit sparse... I don't see an attribute that obviously does it.

elements.text: Simple question here - how can I set the Y axis of a plot to a log scale in Makie? I really like the system but the documentation is a bit sparse... I don't see an attribute that obviously does it.

text: You can't, currently. It's a bit more complex because of the gpu backend, but we should get there at some point. Many people ask for this
